p: Various therapeutic approaches are being used since time immemorial for many health ailments apart from the pharmacological treatment. Approximately eighty percent of the World population still depends upon the use of herbal remedies for their health care. Nigeria and many other countries in West Africa are blessed with several varieties of medicinal plants which are of used for various purposes. This traditional method of treating ailment is transferred from one generation to the other all over the world. Dependence on plants usage has been attributed to their affordability, effectiveness, safety, cultural preferences, and ample accessibility at all times and when it is needed. Globally, traditional healers are using various medicinal plants for the treatment of COVID-19. We therefore present some of the Nigeria indigenous medicinal plants with therapeutic abilities which may serve as effective treatment for COVID-19 due to their antiviral, anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, antipyretic, immunomodulatory and cytoprotective properties ( FigureÂ 4).
